abstract: Apple confirmed that it has snapped up online music retailer Lala.com, a Silicon Valley start-up that has threatened ”the end of the MP3” with its fast song-streaming application.
snippet: Apple confirmed that it has snapped up online music retailer Lala.com, a Silicon Valley start-up that has threatened ”the end of the MP3” with its fast song-streaming application.
lead_paragraph: Apple confirmed that it has snapped up online music retailer Lala.com, a Silicon Valley start-up that has threatened ”the end of the MP3” with its fast song-streaming application.

headline.main: Apple Confirms Purchase of Music Site Lala.com
